component.internal-name: Tại sao bạn nên chọn DTSVN để triển khai?-en

item.subtitle_s: DTSVN has a team of experts with many years of practical experience in the field of IT and Digital Transformation, including leading PhDs and experts from large technology corporations.
DTSVN applies a systematic approach from Columbia University to comprehensively understand the Enterprise and propose optimal solutions.
We provide a detailed Digital Transformation roadmap, including specific solutions, step-by-step implementation instructions, budgets and KPIs to achieve.
